DOC.brief_summary: The study will investigate efficacy of STW5-II as add-on therapy on the rate to remission in patients with mild to moderate ulcerative colitis in an acute flare.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy/Safety Pilot Study to Investigate Iberogast N's Efficacy in Mild to Moderate Colitis Ulcerosa Patients
